title: The Revolutionary War is A-Coming in the New Outlander Trailer
text:
We can expect a number of things from Outlander season five: delicious brooding, the American Revolutionary War, and more delicious brooding. Also, judging by past seasons, probably sexual assault. A new trailer for the new season of the show finds the Frasers preparing to go into battle, having settled in their new home in North Carolina, as Claire and Jamie wonder if they might be safe in “the future.” Whatever this may mean, all signs point to more smoldering in period-specific clothing, methinks. The trailer premiered at New York Comic Con, at a panel for the show featuring series stars Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Maria Doyle Kennedy and David Berry, along with executive producers Ronald D. Moore and Maril Davis and author Diana Gabaldon. Outlander season five premieres on STARZ on Feb. 16, 2020.

Related
description: A panel at New York Comic Con premiered a new Outlander trailer for season five featuring hints at the American Revolutionary War.
